name: Tyrokavteri
author: sarahz911
summary: This is a delicious dip that goes with garlic bread, pita or even tortilla chips.  You can tweak it to taste when you're making it.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce, or to taste
4  roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
directions: In a large bowl, or in the bowl of a stand mixer, combine the cream cheese, feta cheese, hot pepper sauce, white pepper, and lemon juice
Mix on low speed until blended
Gradually mix in the olive oil until it has fully incorporated
Stir in half and half until the mixture is smooth and soft
Stir in the roasted red peppers if using
Cover and store in the refrigerator until ready to serve
